messages.subject: New forum
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to share this newer forum with you all, just in case anyone is intererested: http://www.amimckay.com/forum/index.php Ami is a writer, currently
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to share this newer forum with you all, just in case
anyone is intererested: http://www.amimckay.com/forum/index.php

Ami is a writer, currently working on her first novel (through a
publisher). I first found out about her at soulfulliving.com, where
she's written some awesome articles. Her blog is beautiful (I think
there's a link to it from soulfulliving).

I read some of her blog and was inspired to write and tell her how
much I adored her writing and viewpoints. She wrote back and come to
find out, she's an unschooler!! That was several months ago...
So anyway, when she started her new forum, she invited me and asked
me to let others know about it.
She's got a thread for home/unschooling started, stuff for writers
and a place for lore on Nova Scotia. She's a really incredible free
spirit, and I think some of you would enjoy it.

Ren
